title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama + Ray + Chroma.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and fluent API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async API and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal pod autoscaling.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of Modelfile recipes (Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.) maintained by Ollama.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any Discord server with slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes and insert generated text back into markdown.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama JavaScript client; 20k+ weekly downloads.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama Python client; 100k+ monthly downloads.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming support.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that plugs Ollama models into channels/DMs using Bolt framework and socket mode.
